Welcome to our first grade games page! Here, you’ll find a variety of kid-friendly games that are specifically selected for first grade students. All of our games are free to play and age appropriate for kids.

Playing games can be a fun and engaging way for first grade students to learn and practice new skills. Our first grade games are selected to help students acquire a range of skills, reinforce first grade concepts, and just to have fun.

As a parent or teacher, you can use these games to support your child’s learning at home or in the classroom. Simply choose a game that aligns with the skills your child is working on, and let them have fun while they learn.

Here are some of our favorite first grade games:

Alien Addition: Get ready to defend Earth from invading alien spaceships! In this intergalactic math game, players will sharpen their addition skills as they blast their laser cannons into space. With fast-paced gameplay, players must answer addition problems quickly to level up and save the planet from extraterrestrial threats.

Ducky Race Subtraction: Get ready to race! In this fun multiplayer math game, players will put their subtraction skills to the test as they race along the water with their colorful duck. With fast-paced gameplay, players must quickly answer subtraction problems to win the race and come in first place. Quack your way to math victory!

Kitten Hop: Get ready to play! In this fun multiplayer language arts game, players will practice letter recognition as their playful kitten jumps to balls of yarn. With a fast-paced gameplay, players must identify letters quickly to win the race and come out on top. Hop to it and master the alphabet!

Koala Karts Counting: Get ready to race! In this fun multiplayer math game, players will put their counting skills to the test as they race around the track in a cool koala kart. With fast-paced gameplay, players must quickly count objects to win the race and come in first place. Gear up and let’s go for a counting race!

We hope you and your child have fun playing these games and learning new things!
